name: LemonUnit.com
tagline: We Cut Through Lemon, To Get You All The Juice
description:
At LemonUnit we are passionate about building products from the ground up, we are a team of Superhero consultants and entrepreneurs. When other software houses have let you down, we are here to save the day.
We believe that:
➡️ When you grow we grow
➡️ When we grow you grow
We are a unique IT consultancy from Poland offering bespoke programming. We’ve completely discarded the existing software house model and built a company comprised entirely of seniors who are dedicated to our client-centric approach to development.
We are real partners to our Entrepreneur Clients hence we:
➡️ Make your dream come true – we have all the necessary skills onboard to build your application from scratch.
➡️ Cut costs – we are seniors, our code is flawless, within time frames and budget. 
➡️ Bring relief – we take the responsibility off your shoulders, so you focus on your business! 
➡️ Add value – we are not only a "contractor", we work as trustworthy partner who serves you with our knowledge, experience and skills.
Enough about our goals, tell us more of your dreams and let’s build something astonishing together!
To connect:Send email to contact@lemonunit.com to schedule a call
